DataElement.preferredName: Adverse Event Performed Observation Outcome Code Data Change Text ISO21090.ST.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable and unintended sign, symptom, disease, or other medical occurrence with a temporal association with the use of a medical product, procedure or other therapy, or in conjunction with a research study, regardless of causal relationship. EXAMPLE(S): death, back pain, headache, pulmonary embolism, heart attack A character string that is a revision of the original text observation result to enable the coding of the text. EXAMPLE(S): If the original text is "hedache", the value code modified text could be changed to "headache", so that the text can be successfully encoded.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Adverse Event Performed Observation Outcome Code Data Change Text
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable or unintended symptom, sign, or disease including an abnormal laboratory finding) temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure.  Such events can be intervention related, dose related, route related, patient related, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.:A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.:The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.:The words of something written.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable or unintended symptom, sign, or disease including an abnormal laboratory finding) temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure.  Such events can be intervention related, dose related, route related, patient related, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).
Executed and carried through to completion.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.

Property.preferredDefinition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.:A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.:The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.:The words of something written.

Concepts.definition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.
The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Character string datatype stands for text data.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
